title: Can we have a new support champion?
body:
Ability that can cleanse any negative buff from the enemy. Ability to heal, ability to shield, and an ability increase spell/attack damage.
We need more healer support.
;)

replies.body:
Sounds like your talking about Sona?

{{champion:37}}
are you talking about michaels janna?
No thanks, Soraka is enough cancer and I main support.
